name: mcp-server-neo4j-cypher
description: Manage Cypher graph queries between LLMs and Neo4j with natural language queries.

rating.reason: Tool names are clear and specific with appropriate neo4j prefixes. Descriptions are basic but functional - they explain what each tool does in 1-2 sentences. However, descriptions lack important context like when to use each tool, what information they provide, or key limitations (except for the APOC note). Parameter documentation is minimal but adequate, clearly indicating purpose and types. The toolset provides essential functionality but leaves users to infer usage patterns and constraints.
